fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
If this spawns from One sin and a hundreds of good deeds (4387) , remove all other Lcorp roles from the game
If a visitor visits you they have to roll 36 d6's
If more than 25 are higher than 4 the visitor gets blessed
If less than 13 are higher than 4 the visitor dies and a random person gets blessed
One sin and a hundreds of good deeds (4387) can never be blessed
If 4 people are blessed become WhiteNight (4389) and turn the first 3 people into Apostle (4390) and the last person into the Sinner (4391)

fields.name: Wincon:
fields.value: Have Plauge Doctor ascend into WhiteNight
